import React from 'react'; import './dropdown.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; //passing the created props const Dropdown = (props) => { //using the passed props by js destructuring const {label, selectedOption, setSelectedOption, options} = props; const [isOptionsVisible, setIsOptionsVisible] = useState(false); return (
Dropdown

}
setIsOptionsVisible(!isOptionsVisible)}>

) }; export default Dropdown;
